title: Raitavechamitra
are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
name: Name
dont_have_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
stay_hydrated_desc: Drink water regularly throughout the day to stay hydrated.
take_breaks_desc: Why breaks are important and some simple exercises.
stretch_importance_desc: Taking short breaks helps prevent fatigue, improves concentration, and can reduce physical strain.
neck_stretch_desc: Tilt your head slowly to each side, holding for 10-15 seconds.
shoulder_shrugs_desc: Raise your shoulders towards your ears, hold for a few seconds, and release.
leg_stretch_desc: Extend one leg out, bend forward slightly, and hold for 15 seconds.
protect_uv_desc: Learn about UV index and sun protection.
uv_desc: UV (Ultraviolet) rays from the sun can cause skin damage, sunburn, and increase the risk of skin cancer. The UV index measures the intensity of UV rays, ranging from 0 (low) to 11+ (extreme).
low_uv_desc: Minimal risk of harm from unprotected sun exposure.
moderate_uv_desc: Take precautions, such as wearing sunscreen.
high_uv_desc: Protection against skin damage is needed.
very_high_uv_desc: Extra precautions, like wearing sunglasses, are needed.
get_sleep_desc: Track your sleep for better health.
remedies_tips_desc: Discover home remedies and wellness tips.
honey_lemon_desc: Mix honey with warm lemon water to boost immunity and detoxify.
ginger_tea_desc: Ginger helps soothe throat irritation and improves digestion.
turmeric_milk_desc: Turmeric is anti-inflammatory and can help boost recovery.
stay_active_desc: Daily exercise improves cardiovascular health and boosts your mood.
confirm_sign_out: Are you sure you want to sign out?
are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this payment?
are_you_sure_sign_out: Are you sure you want to sign out?
pm_kisandescription: Provides direct income support to small and marginal farmers.
karnataka_raithadescription: Offers financial assistance for millet cultivation in Karnataka.
rkvydescription: Aims at ensuring comprehensive development of agriculture.
mukhyamantri_krishidescription: Direct benefit transfer to small farmers for farming assistance.
atal_solardescription: Provides solar pumps to farmers for irrigation purposes.
pmfbydescription: Provides crop insurance to protect farmers against crop loss.
wbcisdescription: Covers risks arising from adverse weather conditions.
soil_healthdescription: Helps farmers in identifying the nutritional deficiencies of their soil.
krishi_bhagyadescription: Supports farmers with water conservation and irrigation facilities in dry regions.
pmksydescription: Improves irrigation infrastructure and aims for 'Har Khet Ko Pani'.
nabard_ruraldescription: Assists rural infrastructure projects like irrigation and soil conservation.
farm_mechanizationdescription: Promotes mechanization of farm operations by providing subsidies on agricultural equipment.
custom_hiringdescription: Enables farmers to hire agricultural machinery at affordable rates.
national_horticulturedescription: Supports the holistic growth of the horticulture sector.
pm_garibdescription: Provides food grains to poor farmers in times of crisis.
national_livestockdescription: Promotes the development of livestock, especially in rural areas.
pkvydescription: Promotes organic farming and develops sustainable farming models.
